details:
• 20 acres of pristine farmland in Alamo, Georgia
  • Surrounded by nature and is only a short drive from the Appalachian Trail
  • Home to a variety of wildlife, including deer, turkey, and even the occasional bear
  • Property has a pond, perfect for fishing or swimming on hot summer days
  • There is creek that runs through the property, providing hours of fun for kids of all ages
  • Situated on a hill, providing stunning views of the surrounding countryside
  • The Cotton Patch is a true nature lover's paradise and would make an excellent primary residence or vacation home
title: The Cotton Patch
description: Nestled in the heart of Alamo, Georgia, The Cotton Patch is a stunning 20-acre property that would make an ideal home for someone looking for peace and quiet in a rural setting. The land is mostly wooded, with a small clearing near the center that would be perfect for building a home or farmhouse. There is a creek running through the property, and a small pond near the edge of the woods. The Cotton Patch is truly a nature lover's paradise, and would be perfect for someone looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life.
